title: BRIEF-Lumentum To Acquire Oclaro For $1.8 Bln In Cash And Stock

organizations.name: bln in cash and stock reuters

text: 29 AM / in 5 minutes BRIEF-Lumentum To Acquire Oclaro For $1.8 Bln In Cash And Stock Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Oclaro Inc: * LUMENTUM TO ACQUIRE OCLARO FOR $1.8B IN CASH AND STOCK * OCLARO INC - ‍ESTIMATE MORE THAN $60 MILLION IN ANNUAL RUN-RATE SYNERGIES WITHIN 12 TO 24 MONTHS​ AFTER DEAL * OCLARO INC - DEAL FOR AT $9.99 PER SHARE OR APPROXIMATELY $1.8 BILLION IN EQUITY VALUE * OCLARO INC - OCLARO STOCKHOLDERS WILL BE ENTITLED TO RECEIVE $5.60 IN CASH AND 0.0636 OF A SHARE OF LUMENTUM COMMON STOCK * OCLARO INC - DEAL EXPECTED TO BE ACCRETIVE TO NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE IMMEDIATELY AFTER CLOSING​ * OCLARO INC - ‍LUMENTUM INTENDS TO FUND CASH CONSIDERATION WITH A COMBINATION OF CASH ON HAND FROM COMBINED COMPANIES’ BALANCE SHEETS, AMONG OTHERS​ * OCLARO INC - ‍ ONE MEMBER OF OCLARO’S BOARD AS MUTUALLY DETERMINED, WILL JOIN LUMENTUM’S BOARD UPON CLOSING OF DEAL​ * OCLARO INC - ‍LUMENTUM INTENDS TO FUND CASH CONSIDERATION OF DEAL ALSO WITH $550 MILLION IN DEBT FINANCING​ * OCLARO INC - ‍ OCLARO STOCKHOLDERS ARE EXPECTED TO OWN APPROXIMATELY 16% OF COMBINED COMPANY AT CLOSING OF DEAL​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
